Q1: Ikintu wibanda ko cane mu myaka yawe y'ubuyabaga
Q1C: Nama ndonka inzira z'ingene nca amafaranga
Q1D: namara umwanya wose nkora programa za ordinateur
Q1F: Abagwizatunga benshi bagize amahirwe mu vyo bakora baribuka ingene batanguye ubucuruzi bwabo mu kugurisha ibintu ku bo bahora bigana.Ariko abagwizatunga bo mu gisata c'ama ordinateurs akenshi bavuga ko bamaze imyaka yabo y'ubuyabaga baterekwa ibijanye na programa za ordinateurs.
Q2: Ni hehe ugeze mu kugerezako mu buzima?
Q2C: Ndagerezako kenshi, ariko iyo bikenewe gusa
Q2D: Nama nahuye n'ibibazo buri gihe kubera kugerezako bikabije
Q2F: Gutangura urudandazwa rushasha hama harimwo kugerezako, ubushobozi bwo kumenya ingene witwara mu ngorane zo kugerezako birahambaye cane ushaka gutera imbere nk'umugwizatunga. Ariko utegerezwa kumenya aho ugarukira ku rugero rwo kugerezako, hanyuma ntukora igisunitswe n'umuyaga canke nk'uwutaco anezwe.
Q3: Witeguye gukora amasaha angana gute mu rudandazwa rwawe rushasha?
Q3B: Amasha 12 ku munsi ariko atari mu mpera z'indwi (weekend)
Q3C: amasaha 10 ku  munsi, iminsi 6 ku ndwi
Q3F: Gutunganya urudandazwa rushasha bisaba umwanya munini,na cane cane iyo ushaka vy'ukuri ko rutera imbere. Ico rugutwara ku buzima bwawe bivana n'ico ushaka kuri urwo rudandazwa rwawe.
Q4A: Kugira ndonke amafaranga menshi ashoboka, hanyuma mbeho ubuzima bwiza cane
Q4B: Kugira mbe umukoresha wanje nyene, hanyuma nkore nkurikije gahunda z'umuryango wanje
Q4C: Sinshibora kwihanganira guhabwa amategeko n'uwundi muntu
Q4D: Noryoherwa mfise urudandazwa ruteye imbere hanyuma nkagira ico mariye ikibano
Q4F:
Uvuganye n'umugwizatunga uwo ariwe wese akubwira ngo ntibaba barondera amafaranga.
Ahubwo bavuga gushika ku yindi migambi ihanitse gusumba,nko gukunda ivyo bakora,canke icifuzo cabo co kugira ico batereye isi ciza
Q5: Ugeza he kumenya gukoresha amafaranga yawe neza?
Q5B: Mfise amafaranga ndayakoresha, ariko nta na rimwe mba ndi mw'ideni
Q5D: Nta kincika mu kumenya amafaranga yinjira n'abasohoka
Q5F: Gukoresha amafaranga yawe neza birakenewe cane kugira ube umugwizatunga atera imbere. Uko urudandazwa rwawe rukura,niko ukenera kwamaza uzi ingene amafaranga yinjira n'ingene asohoka
Q6D: Nta kuvuga ngo ibintu birahungabanye, ahubwo amahirwe mashasha
Q6F: Ibikorwa vyose vy'ubugwizatunga vyama bihura n'ibibazo utaba witeze rimwe na rimwe,hari n'igihe biba bikomeye cane.Icerekana umugwizatunga azotera imbere n'ingene baheze  bahangana n'ivyo bibazo hanyuma bakabitorera umuti
Q7B: nabi rwose-nta n'umwe ashobora gukora akazi neza nk'uko ndagakora
Q7D: Neza cane, sinshobora gukora vyose jenyene
Q7F: Niba wikorana canke urudandazwa rwawe rufise abakozi bakeya, ni vyiza ko umenya ingene ingingo zose zifatwa. Ariko niba ushaka ko ibikorwa vyawe bitera imbere, hazogera aho utegerezwa gushinga ibikorwa abandi.
Q8: Nihehe woshika  mu gukora neza ibicururuzwa canke service yawe
Q8A: Nagura ibintu bizimbutse hanyuma ngasubira kubigusiha ku nyungu nini
Q8C: Nobikora neza kurusha abo duhiganwa kugira ndonke inyungu nini
Q8D: Vyotegerezwa kuba vyiza cane bishoboka kandi nta na kimwe ntokora kugira bibe gutyo
Q8F: ivyo ucuruza bitegerezwa kuba bifise agaciro keza niba ushaka ko abantu babihurumbira. Ariko niba bisaba uburyo bwinshi kugira ubishikeko bishobora guca bizimba cane gutyo abantu benshi ntibashobora kubigura
Q9: Wogira iki hamwe wohabwa amafaranga menshi ku rudandazwa rwawe?
Q9A: Kuvuga ''ego'' kugira nce noroherwa mu gufata ikiruhuko hakiri kare
Q9B: Kuvuga ''ego'' hanyuma mgashimishwa no kuguma aho nk'umukozi mukuru
Q9C: Kuvuga ''ego''  hanyuma buno nyene ngaca ntangura urudandazwa rushasha
Q9D: Kuvuga ''oya'' kuko urudandazwa aribwo buzima bwanje, nkandi nshaska ko rutera imbere
Q9F: Gufata icemezo co kugurisha n'ikibazo abagwizatunga benshi bahura. N'ubwo ushobora kwiyumvira gufata ikiruho c'izabukuru hakiri kare, uko siko umugwizatunga nyawe yibaza.
RH1: Ndagukeje,ushobora kuronka za miliardi z'amafaranga kuri internet.
R1: Ushobora kuba ufise ibikenewe kugira ube umugwizatunga ateye imbere kuri internet.Usa n'uwaronse ibikenewe mu bumenyi bwa ordinateurs kuva ukiri umuyabaga, kandi usa n'uwufise ubundi bukerebutsi bwo  gushika kw'iterambere.
R2: Usa n'uwiteguriye gukora amasaha make ku munsi ku rudandazwa rwawe.Nta rudandazwa na rumwe rushobora  gutera imbere mu gihe utarwongera umwanya. Ariko ugize amahirwe, ushobora guca amafaranga yunganira ayo uca mu kazi kawe ko ku murango
R3: Usa n'uwufise ingorane zo gushinga ibikorwa abandi hanyuma/canke bikakugora kwumva ibineguro vy'abandi.Ivyo bisigura ko mu gisata c'urudandazwa, ushobora kuba wogira amahirwe gusumba mu gukora wenyene kurusha kugerageza kuba umugwizatunga
RH4: Usa n'uwiyubara cane kuburyo udashobora kugerezako bidakenewe
R4: Usa n'uwutinya cane kugerezako, kumbura ivyo bituma uvyofatamwo neza gusumba abatari bake.Gushinga urudandazwa rushasha ni tombora ishobora kugira amashirwe make, abagitangura benshi bananirwa mu myaka mike ya mbere.
RH5: Ivyo ucuruza bishobora kuba bizimvye cane
R5: Icifuzo cawe co co gukora uko ushoboye kwose kugira utange ibintu vyiza bituma ico kiguzi uzoca ugishira ku muguzi. Ivyo bivuga ko igiciro kizoca kiba kinini n'ingorane zo kuduza urudandazwa rwawe
RH6: Ushobora kuba utazi gukoresha amafaranga neza
R6: Gutunganya urudandazwa bisaba gucungera neza ingene amafaranga akoreshwa.Ariko uremera ko ivyo ugukoresha amafaranga ari akajagari,canke ko ukoresha amafaranga yose ufise. Ico bishikako n'uko urudandazwa rwawe rushobora kubura amafaranga vuba.
R7: Neza cane. ushobora kuba umugwizatunga mwiza cane.
RH8: Ushbora kuba utari indongozi nziza bikwiye
R8: Kuba umugwizatunga ateye imbere bishobora kuba igikorwa kitoroshe. N'ibikorwa vy'ubugwizatunga biteye imbere birashika bigahura n'ingorane,kandi gufasha ikigo c'ubugwizatunga kuva mu ngorane bisaba ubushobozi bwo kuvyitwaramwo no kuba indongozi
RH9: Ushobora wibanda cane mu kurondera gutunga
R9: Icifuzo cawe co gutunga cane gishobora kuba gisigura ko udafise icerekezo ku gikorwa gikenewe kugira ube umugwizatunga atera imbere.benshi mu bafise ibigo vy'ubugwizatunga biteye imbere bavuga kuronka itunga rinshi atarico kiza imbere
RH10: Urambababira, ariko kugerageza kuba umugwizatunga bishobora kuba atari ivyawe
R10: Ntuhebe kuko akazi ariyo nyishu yacu ya mbere nziza.Usa n'uwutitanga bikwiye canke udafise icerekezo bikwiwe kugira ube umugwizatunga.Ariko ntiwibaze ko ico ari igitutsi-n'abantu bake cane bafise ubushobozi bwo kugira ibigo bitera imbere.Benshi muri twebwe tugenewe gukorera abandi.
R11: Gutunganya ikigo c'ubugwizatunga birimwo ku bishobora kuba ngombwa ko ugerezako. Ariko ugerezako ku vyo utegerezwa kuba waharuye neza.Ahubwo ushobora kunezerwa no gukinisha ikigo cawe mu kamari, bishobora kuvamwo uguhomba.
RH12: Ushobora kuba umugwizatunga atera imbere n'ikigo kibayabaye
R12: Mu gihe usa n'uwufise ibisabwa vyose kugira ube umugwizatunga atera imbere,usa n'uwutiteguriye canke n'udashaka gukoresha amasaha akwiye kugira ikigo cawe gitere imbere. N'ubwo rero coba kironka inyungu, ikigo cawe gishobora kuguma ari gito.
RH13: Urambabarira ariko ibidandazwa vyawe bishobora kuba atari vyiza bikwiye.
R13: Kuronka inyungu mu kugurisha ibicuruzwa  vyawe canke service zawe nivyiza cane. Ariko niba ubwiza bwavyo budakwihe urugero, bigenze neza ushobora kutaronka abiyongeza kugura.Bigenze nabi  urugero rw'ivyo ucuruza rushobora kugabanuka cane uko izina ryawe rigenda riragabanuka.
QUESTION: Ikibazo
SHARE_R1: Nshobora kuba mfise ibisabwa kugira mbe umugwizatunga kuri internet, weho?
SHARE_R2: Nta mwanya wanje noshira mu rudandazwa rwanje, weho?
SHARE_R5: Ibicuruzwa vyanje bishobora kuba bizimvye cane,weho?
SHARE_R8: Nshobora kuba ntafise uburongozi mu maraso,weho?
SHARE_R10: Sinshaka guheba akazi ko ku murango, weho?
SHARE_R12: nshobora kuba noba umugwizatunga w'ikigo giciriritse,weho?
SHARE_R13: Ibidandazwa vyanje bishobora kuba bidafise ubwiza bukwiye, ivyawe vyo ni gute?
